name: On a Cultist Hill
description:
Gods are fighting each other and the only way to save the world is via some sacrifices… Gather resources in order to survive the day… And serve the gods when the night falls… Will you survive until the war ends? GAMEPLAY:

Gather resources to stay alive. White boxes give you more while grey ones take some away. You can sacrifice resource to gods by selecting it and then pressing [ SACRIFICE ]

While you are staying alive, you also need to keep gods in balance. By sacrificing resource with blue-outline you give power to blue god , red-outline for red god

If either of the gods wins the war or you run out of one of your resources , it’s game over .

(Don’t worry, this all is explained in the game <3)
